body_html:
mari-linhares is correct. @contractorwolf's case deserves a warning as the Estimator.predict might not work well with constant arrays. numpy_input_fn should be the best option for now and it will be supported for future releases (see API stability promises )

At head, the warning should be removed for Dataset API (already). See code here
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/estimator/estimator.py

I am going to close this issue. Feel free to reopen if it is still a problem.

body:
mari-linhares  is correct. @contractorwolf's case deserves a warning as the Estimator.predict might not work well with constant arrays. numpy_input_fn should be the best option for now and it will be supported for future releases (see [API stability promises ](https://www.tensorflow.org/programmers_guide/version_compat))

At head, the warning should be removed for Dataset API (already). See code here
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/estimator/estimator.py

I am going to close this issue. Feel free to reopen if it is still a problem.
